授業目的:
The purpose of this course is for students to develop English listening,
 reading, speaking, and writing skills, in addition to learning new 
vocabulary, all while working in an all-English communicative 
atmosphere.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:
1. write brief reports on various topics.
2. deliver brief presentations on various topics.
3. learn and operate in an all-English classroom environment.
授業方法: This class will be taught in a classroom, face-to-fact format.

トピック.授業計画1: The class will focus on topic in the textbook with additional supplementary materials.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hours outside of class each week on homework.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Keynote 2 by David Bohlke published by Cengage. Students who have purchased the textbook during 2023 do not have to buy another textbook for 2024.
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic: The class will focus on topic in the textbook with additional supplementary materials.
評価.課題等へのフィードバック方法Methods for Providing Feed: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hours outside of class each week on homework.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Mid-term Exam 20, Final Exam 20, Weekly Writing Journal 20, writing assignments, homework, quizzes and presentations 40.

name: 【200】インテンシブ・イングリッシュ　６０／Intensive English
